script: I absolutely love living in this part of the city. There are so many great cafes and parks within walking distance. Admittedly, one major downside is the terrible traffic in the evening. It can take forever just to drive a few blocks.

options: To concede a negative point about an otherwise positive situation.
To aggressively complain about the local government.
To deny that there are any problems with the area.
To brag about how close they live to the city center.

explanation: The speaker uses 'Admittedly' to willingly accept and introduce a drawback to something they generally like.
